title: Parcel Map
description: Parcel shapefile with property information including ownership and tax valuation information. For a point based file with the same information visit this page: https://data.detroitmi.gov/Property-Parcels/Parcel-Points-Ownership/eijm-6nr4

title: Current Master Plan Future General Land Use
description: The following field definitions make up the shapefile attribute table called Master Plan of Policies Future General Land Use Map for City of Detroit adopted in 2009. This shapefile consists of all areas in the city defined with the Master Plan of Policies Future General Land Use Map. The Master Plan Future General Land Use Map has been amended since it was adopted. The layer was updated/amended on November 25, 2014.

title: Zoning
description:
The Zoning District of every parcel in the City of Detroit.
Zoning Categories as defined by CPC, updated in September, 2016.
